contentConfiguration.title: NIH’s cap on indirect costs could threaten research at Stanford and across the country
contentConfiguration.summary: A Massachusetts court has blocked the National Institutes of Health cap on indirect costs, which university leaders say would sharply cut back U.S. biomedical research.
